title: Collaborative Inquiry-Based Science Learning Environment Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based collaborative tools and implementation of field-immersive scientific problem-solving projects

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute collaborative inquiry processes using various digital platforms
Learners can independently establish project-based learning environments to solve real-world science problems
Learners can evaluate peers' learning designs and suggest improvements through peer review

resources: Collaborative Learning Management System (LMS) Mobile Version
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
